QuestData.Title: Scouting The Strand
QuestData.Description:
It has been a long time since we have heard from our scouts at the outpost.
They may have been cut off from us due to the naga attack. I need to check in with them and get an update on the movements of the naga forces.
You should come with me, this will be a good opportunity for you to meet more of the clan and get a closer look at our operation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the Ankoan scouts at the Ashen Strand.
